author: Adam Withnall, William Yang, Betsy Joles, Adam Withnall, William Yang, Betsy Joles
title: Inside China's victory over coronavirus: Family separations, door sensors – and belly buttons massages
description: While case numbers soar in the West, Wuhan - the city where the coronavirus outbreak began - will finally dismantle roadblocks and open up non-essential businesses from Wednesday. William Yang, Betsy Joles and Adam Withnall report
content:
On Wednesday, for the first time in more than two months, 11 million people in Chinas Wuhan will have the option to step out of their homes and leave the city.
The lifting of the lockdown in the place where the global coronavirus pandemic started is a symbol… [+12589 chars]
